alert.note: Alert for Alachua; Bradford; Clay; Marion; Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 27 at 9:29PM EDT until April 27 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 PM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN BRADFORD...SOUTHEASTERN ALACHUA...NORTHEASTERN MARION...NORTHWESTERN PUTNAM AND SOUTHWESTERN CLAY COUNTIES... At 928 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Lake Geneva to near Anthony, moving east to northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Interlachen, Keystone Heights, Melrose, Fort McCoy, Citra, Hawthorne, Sparr, Florahome, Melrose Landing and Orange Heights. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
